name: AjaxImport

scriptsrc.description: Specifies the URL, relative to the web root, of the directory that contains the JavaScript files used used by Lucee.

csssrc.description: Specifies the URL, relative to the web root, of the directory that contains the CSS files used by AJAX features

tags.description: A comma-delimited list of tags or tag-attribute combinations for which to import the supporting JavaScript files on this page.

description: Controls the JavaScript files that are imported for use on pages that use Luceex AJAX tags and features.
